a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Relative coverage of causes of death in The Guardian newspaper, 1999 to 2016
Relative coverage of articles mentioning the top 10 causes of death in the USA (in addition to terrorism, homicide and drug overdoses) in The
Guardian newspaper. This is based on the number of articles which mention any of the terms or synonym/related terms (e.g. 'murder' for
homicide) in the headline or body text. This is normalized to the relative share by dividing by the total number of articles which feature any of
Data source: Shen et al. (2018). Based on The Guardian article database.
